infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload profile pictures and documents.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to take photos for profile pictures and documents.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs access to save photos to your photo library.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos for profile pictures and documents.
